example.source:
<a:chart width="500" height="400">
                <a:axis 
                  mode  = "2D"
                  x1    = "-1" 
                  x2    = "15" 
                  y1    = "-1" 
                  y2    = "9">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        plane{fill:#f8f8f8;stroke:#f8f8f8;};
                        tiles{fill:#f8f8f8;stroke:#f8f8f8;};
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      series    = "1 2 3 8 5 2 4 5 6 8 8 7 7 7 8 0">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                            graph {
                              fill      : #8dc63f;
                              fillopacity : 0.7;
                              notransit : 0.5;
                              stroke      : #598527;
                              weight    : 2;
                            }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "bar" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      series    = "1#a 0#b 2#c 0#d 3#e 0#a 8#b 0#c 5#d 0#e 2#c">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                            graph.a{fill:#f26522;}
                            graph.b{fill:#fff200;}
                            graph.c{fill:#00aeef;}
                            graph.d{fill:#8dc63f;}
                            graph.e{fill:#ec008c;}
                            graph{fill:white;notransit:0.5;stroke:black;weight:1.5;}
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                </a:axis>
            </a:chart>
